definition: velvetleaf (Abutilon avicennae), plant of the jute family/bright
ethnic Chinese/non-Chinese citizen of Chinese ancestry
lit. branches and descendants/of a similar kind/related

sentences.english: All non-Nepalese students enrolled at any of Hong Kong's universities are eligible to participate in the contest.
sentences.chinese: 所有非尼泊尔裔香港注册大学学生均可参加。

sentences.english: An estimated fifth of them are in the country illegally.
sentences.chinese: 据估计，这些拉美裔人口中约五分之一都是非法移民。

sentences.english: Japanese-Americans were rounded up and interned during World War II.
sentences.chinese: 第二次世界大战期间，日本裔美国人遭到集体关押。

sentences.english: They are African-and-American kids, and their coming to D.C.
sentences.chinese: 他们都是非裔美籍的孩子，此次来环境保护署总部。

sentences.english: Hispanic senators have been few and far between, as have Hispanic governors.
sentences.chinese: 西语裔的参议员和州长更是凤毛麟角。

sentences.english: Donna J. Gambrell – Director, Community Development Financial Institutions Fund.
sentences.chinese: 甘贝尔，社区发展金融基金主席，非洲裔。

sentences.english: A Latina on the Supreme Court's great.
sentences.chinese: 在最高法院有拉丁裔确实很强大。

sentences.english: The vast majority of pioneers in the hip hop industry have been African-American and Latino.
sentences.chinese: 嘻哈业内的大部分先驱者都是非裔美国人和拉丁人。

sentences.english: You'll see that Hispanics have already contributed so much to this country.
sentences.chinese: 你会看到拉美裔已经为这个国家贡献了这么多。

sentences.english: Being an Italian American myself， I understand the importance of immigration.
sentences.chinese: 作为意大利裔的美国人，我懂得移民的重要性。

sentences.english: But like other immigrant groups, the Vietnamese also experienced some problems.
sentences.chinese: 可是就像其他移民团体一样，越南裔也遇到一些问题。

sentences.english: In the past Hispanics remained disproportionately poor and working class.
sentences.chinese: 过去，贫穷人口和劳工阶层始终占拉美裔的很大比例。

sentences.english: Rizwan wants his four-year old son to get People of Indian Origin status.
sentences.chinese: 里知旺想让他四岁大的儿子获得印度裔的地位。

sentences.english: Steam Whistle's Czech brewmaster asked for a bedroom at the brewery.
sentences.chinese: 公司的那位捷克裔酿酒大师就要求在厂里置一间卧室。

sentences.english: Kashkari is an Indian-American who has a few things in common with Paulson.
sentences.chinese: 卡什卡利是印度裔美国人，与鲍尔森很有些共同之处。

sentences.english: Rizwan wants his four-year old son to get People of Indian Origin status.
sentences.chinese: 里知旺想让四岁大的儿子获得印度裔的地位。

definition: primogenitor/founder of a school or trade
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
to migrate/to move to a new place of residence
to inhabit a region (esp. ethnic group)/to congregate
to move (from one residence to another)
to live far away from one's native place/to reside in a foreign country
